name: 3D Action Platformer
description:
A very, very, very short game where you go from point A to point B and fight a couple things along the way. 

This was created using free Unity assets, I didn't make any of them, just arranged them and edited a few.

(I wouldn't download this unless you really want to waste a couple minutes, or you're my teacher.)

Controls:

Move: W A S D

Jump:  Space

Look: Mouse

Attack: Left Mouse Button

Pause: Esc
